thread.title: Three Reasons to Spend Spring Break at Aulani, a Disney Resort & Spa
thread.title_full: Three Reasons to Spend Spring Break at Aulani, a Disney Resort & Spa

author: Michael Ramirez
title: Three Reasons to Spend Spring Break at Aulani, a Disney Resort & Spa
text:
If you are looking for a spring break vacation, there are many reasons why Aulani, a Disney Resort & Spa is the perfect destination for your family. Here are three!

Aulani Resort is located in beautiful Hawaii . Simply put, Hawaii is paradise. The island’s vibrant culture, luscious landscape, perfect weather and bounty of activities make Hawaii a dream vacation. Aulani Resort is located on Oahu’s western shore in Ko Olina, which means “place of joy.” Just 30 minutes from Honolulu, Ko Olina is a relaxing, family-friendly destination.

The resort’s new KA WA‘A luau is fabulous . No visit to Hawaii would be complete without experiencing a luau. Aulani Resort’s new luau show takes you on an enchanting journey through Hawaiian history, sharing the deep cultural roots in canoe (or waʻa) exploration. The evening includes beautiful music and dance, family activities and of course, a delicious luau feast.

There’s Disney magic everywhere you look . While Aulani Resort celebrates the culture of Hawaii, Disney has sprinkled its touch of magic throughout the resort. You can visit with favorite Disney characters , including the newest heroine Moana. More subtly however, Disney’s magic can be found in the tiniest of details and stories woven into the resort’s design, activities, food and more.
If you need a fourth reason, we have a special booking offer! Your family can save up to 35 percent on 5-night stays at Aulani Resort, valid most nights January 2 through March 24, 2017. Hurry, book by February 13, 2017.* Click here for more information.
*Savings based on the non-discounted rate for the same room. The number of rooms allocated for this offer may be limited. Limit 2 rooms per reservation. Excludes suites and 3-bedroom Grand Villas. Additional charges may apply if more than 2 adults per room. Cannot be combined with other discounts or promotions. Advance reservations required.
